Congratulations to Dr. Joe Buck

Carlos Maltzahn Apr 30, 2014

Please join Scott Brandt and me in congratulating Dr. Joe Buck on his successful Ph.D. defense on “Extending MapReduce for Scientific Data”. Joe has already accepted a position at Amazon.com.

Nicely done, Joe!
